”Alexa, start addams family trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: addams family trivia
des: This fun trivia game with put your knowledge of Addams Family to the test with fun questions about your favorite spooky family. Try your best to answer each question correctly and achieve the highest score you can get. Can you answer all the questions correctly without making a single error? Maybe you will get them all right! Find out now in Addams Family Trivia. We hope you enjoy it!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
